Package com.vincent.slidewindow

package com.vincent.slidewindow
This package contains classes related to the sliding window algorithm.
- Repeat DNA Sequence - LeetCode 187
- Find maximum in Sliding Window - LeetCode 239
- Minimum Windows Subsequence - LeetCode 727
- Longest Repeating Character Replacement - LeetCode 424
- Minimum Window Substring - LeetCode 76
- Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters - LeetCode 3
- Minimum Size Subarray Sum - LeetCode 209
- Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock - LeetCode 121
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BestTimeBuySellStock
    LeetCode 121 Easy Given an array where the element at the index i represents the price of a stock on day i, find the maximum profit that you can gain by buying the stock once and then selling it.
    FindLongestSubstring
    LeetCode 3 Medium
    Given a string, str, return the length of the longest substring without repeating characters.
    LongestRepeatingCharacterReplacement
    LeetCode 424 Medium Given a string s and an integer k, find the length of the longest substring in s, where all characters are identical, after replacing, at most, k characters with any other lowercase English character.
    MinimumWindowSequence
    LeetCode 727 - Hard Given two string str1 and str2, find the shortest subtring in str1 such that str2 is a subsequence of the substring
    Subsequence means it can delete any character that get the substring of the original string
    E.g str1 = "abbcb", str2 = "ac", result is "abbc"
    Constraint:
    1 <= str1.length <= 20000
    1 <= str2.length <= 100 Leetcode version contains only lower case
    MinimumWindowSubstring
    LeetCode 76 Hard Given two strings, s and t, find the minimum window substring in s, which has the following properties:
    1.
    MinSubArraySum
    LeetCode 209 Medium
    Given a target and int array nums, find the minimum length of a contiguous subarray of which the sum >= target.
    RepeatDNASequence
    LeetCode 187 - Medium
    Given a string dna and number k, return all the contiguous subsequences (substrings) of length k that occur more than once in the string.
